name: Dark Shadows
description:
Tribute to Dark Shadows 
A Tim Burton Film

In 1760, the young Barnabas Collins and his wealthy family sailed from Liverpool to the New World, founding the town of Collinsport in Maine and their large estate, Collinwood.

Fifteen years later, Barnabas rejects the love of his servant Angelique.  Angelique did not accept Barnabas' refusal, who then secretly became a magician.  Angelique kills Barnabas' parents with magic and curses Barnabas out of jealousy so that "everyone he loves will die".

Under Angelique's spell, Jossette, Barnabas' fiancé falls off a cliff and dies.  Barnabas tries to catch up with Jossette by jumping off a cliff, but she doesn't die, she is cursed by Angelique to eternal suffering as a vampire.  Angelique influences the townspeople to fight Barnabas, and bury him alive.

200 years later, Barnabas awoke from his grave due to an incident.  He returned to his old house, to meet his descendants.  But interestingly, in the house there is a woman who looks like Jossette, her fiancé who died from jumping off a cliff.  Not only that, Barnabas also knew that Angelique was still alive, and controlled the city.
